translations: 踩，踏；行走；沿着……走；用脚踩碎（tread 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He pulled up his slippers at the heel, for he had trodden them down.
sentences.translation: 他把脚上的拖鞋拉了起来，因为他把拖鞋踩坏了。

sentences.sentence: He made his way along a well-trodden path toward the shed.
sentences.translation: 他顺着一条常有人走的小路走向小屋。

sentences.sentence: These working parties will be going over well-trodden ground.
sentences.translation: 这些工作组将按惯例工作。
